message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. I believe it's a fair price considering its rarity and potential benefits. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is there any flexibility on your end to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $2000000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1800000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to be mindful of my expenses. I'm thinking of offering $1400000. Can you consider this price?

I understand that $1800000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much money on the table. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1600000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1600000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of offering $1200000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can work with me.
